
{{Client event}}
{{New feature/item|3.0150|1.5||
This event is triggered when the cursor changes within a browser window.
}}

==Parameters== 
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
int cursorId
</syntaxhighlight>
*'''cursorId:''' The new cursor ID. See [[/#Cursor_IDs.md|Cursor IDs]]

==Source==
The [[/event_system#Event_source.md|source]] of this event is the browser element the cursor change occured in.
